recipesJson.name: Sonic Cherry Limeade
recipesJson.author: BMW
recipesJson.description: *MONEYSAVER* We got into DIY to save money. This is a cheap, good cherry limeade. I tried many variations of this and it is the closest I could get it to a sonic cherry limeade. That is regular lime tahity not cold pressed.  Age time 1 to 3 days. Mixed at 80/20. Enjoy!

reviews.text: Weak but good flavor. I don't often say this, but I think it actually needs to go heavier on the flavor percentages. I'd personally go with 1% Cherry, 2% Lime, and .5% Super Sweet. Failing that, I think this might also be an excellent recipe for TFA Sweetener, at 1% to sweeten and cut the edges off the lime.
